# Front End Capstone Project


This project I used HTML, CSS & BOOTSTRAP Technologies to build it. This page's responsive between different screens. This Project it's based on [ZATTIX](https://www.behance.net/gallery/24796463/ZATTIX?isa0=1#from_ims=true&old_hash=&api=authorize#access_token=eyJ4NXUiOiJpbXNfbmExLWtleS0xLmNlciIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..hl2CcjSkZDMwhVaWDnWXR6VxzNAyIVpGPfb8wUDR3olA0CKSWNrHOQDNNc6f6MYLU1Pc7970fPaWrT77pO78Hvr879ZYtMsmcCyhg6ZHDTj6mp38mJASi2jRUQP4mAPseW4GXEc4A1dy3ZhvwrJa60Vi2vnTTqefbd83CnaGIdFdUhyHj0P4Ef_DqR710PZGofCoaMhmzQ91kcpPxz5tG6KZKW5BZRD9asVtSHhlzLJtGKIDZ4QCsxBgt0jO3RN3eu28MWtQywk-NFzdL3uQasO10fvpIG5T9kG7UgFZdRDmOkGN9qc6Mep0_obOMJrbySQFRlIS2wX-dX9gmdCVLg&state=%7B%22ac%22%3A%22behance.net%22%2C%22csrf%22%3A%22118563b5-5151-4b8c-a6b8-bfa33234773f%22%2C%22timestamp%22%3A%221596488720376%22%2C%22version%22%3A1%7D&token_type=bearer&expires_in=86399996)  by Mohammed Awad.
The project contains just two pages the main page that contains Item Categories and the second page is the Search Result this page will open clicking on the search button.

![screenshot](mockup-cr.png)


## Built With

- HTML
- CSS3
- BOOTSTRAP

MORE TOOLS
- CSS Linter & HTML Validator

## Live Demo

[Live Demo Link](https://rawcdn.githack.com/carlos-ssh/Zattix-Store/132ca450851a65b0891a34a5a9163924b7d5bc52/index.html)


## Getting Started
To get a local copy up and running follow these simple example steps.

git clone [Repository](https://github.com/carlos-ssh/Zattix-Store.git) Open the index.html with your favorite browser Explore the website

## Usage

Just open the index.html file
